title: The Gladiator's Girl
description: After being singled out in her university history class, Jessie becomes the victim of her professor's strange magic which sends her back in time to ancient Rome where she finds herself in the cell of history's most famous and ruthless gladiator, Magnus Maximus.  Although the intimidating gladiator shows her his caring, sensual side, he still has to go out into the arena and face his doom. Will Jessie share vital information and change the course of history? And will she give into the temptation of the gladiator?  Warning! This 7k word erotic romance contains strong language, explicit scenes, and a sexy alpha male gladiator. Adult readers only!  keywords: m/f, historical erotica
author: Violette Paradise
